    • updateChat

      public void updateChat(String username, String message)
      Method called by the server. Transform the prefix in "username: " then calls populate chat to show the message log correctly
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player that sent the message.
      message - The message.

    • updateChat

      public void updateChat(String fromUsername, String toUsername, String message)
      Transform the prefix of the received message in [From: “fromUsername"]: or [To: "toUsername"]: based on the client username or ignores the message if he is not involved then calls populate chat to show the message log correctly
      Parameters:
      fromUsername - The username of the player that sent the message.
      toUsername - The username of the player that will receive the message.
      message - The message.

    • showReady

      public void showReady(String username, boolean status)
      Method implemented in the LobbyController only Updates the ready status of players in the lobby. This method sets the ready status text ("Ready" or "Not Ready") for each player in the lobby based on their current status. It checks which player has changed their status and updates the corresponding UI label accordingly. The method performs the following actions: 1. Retrieves the player's position in the list from the application. 2. Compares the given username with the usernames in the player list. 3. Sets the ready status text for the corresponding player based on the provided status.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player whose status has changed.
      status - the current ready status of the player (true if ready, false otherwise).

    • show_goldDeck

      public void show_goldDeck(PlayableCard firstCardDeck, PlayableCard card1, PlayableCard card2)
      Method implemented in the InGameController only Updates the UI to display the top cards of the gold deck.

      This method sets the images of the provided PlayableCard objects to their corresponding UI components for the gold deck. Specifically, it sets the image of the first card in the deck and two other cards from the gold deck.

      Parameters:
      firstCardDeck - The top card of the gold deck to be displayed.
      card1 - The first card from the gold deck to be displayed.
      card2 - The second card from the gold deck to be displayed.

      playArea - A Map representing the play area with Point keys and PlayableCard values.

    • handleInGamePlayers

      public void handleInGamePlayers(LinkedHashMap<String,Boolean> players)
      This method is implemented in GameList and MainMenu controllers to just set the player list, in Lobby controller to modify the player list and update the lobby and in InGamePlayer to show disconnected and surrendered players

    • sendMessage

      protected void sendMessage(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event, io.github.palexdev.materialfx.controls.MFXTextField textField)
      Handles sending messages and tab completion in a chat text field.

      This method listens for key events on a text field to handle message sending when the Enter key is pressed and handles tab completion for player names when the Tab key is pressed.

      If the Enter key is pressed and the text field is not empty, the method checks if the message is directed to a specific player (indicated by a prefix "/playerName"). If it is, the method extracts the player's name and the message, sends the message to the specified player, and updates the text field. If the message is not directed to a specific player, it is sent as a general chat message.

      If the Tab key is pressed, the method autocompletes the player name based on the prefix entered in the text field. If the prefix matches a player's name, the method updates the text field with the full player name and retains any additional text entered by the user.

      Parameters:
      event - The key event that triggers the message send or tab completion.
      textField - The text field where the user types the message.

    • showCountDown
